timeline.bodyText: return this instead?  DO we need this function?
timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: TimeDimensionProjection is just an interface, so I return a new implementation here.
replies.author: hellohanchen

timeline.bodyText: We could probably use generics here.
timeline.author: aklish
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@

+package com.yahoo.elide.datastores.aggregation.query;
+
+import com.yahoo.elide.datastores.aggregation.metadata.models.Metric;
+
+/**
+ * Represents a projected metric column as an alias in a query.
+ */
+public interface MetricProjection extends ColumnProjection {
+    /**
+     * Get the projected metric.
+     *
+     * @return metric column
+     */
+    @Override
+    Metric getColumn();
